Speaker: narrator
Dialogue: Legend has it, that it was written by the dark ones: NECRONOMICON EX MORTES; Roughly translated...The Book of the Dead.

Speaker: narrator
Dialogue: To trace the origin of the Book, we must go back...back...to a day when spirits ruled the earth.

Speaker: narrator
Dialogue: When the seas ran red with blood.

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: Kanda...Es-trata...Ta-toon...Hazan sobar...Ear-Grets, Gat, ...Nos-feratos ...Amantos...Kanda!

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: It has only been a few hours since I've translated and spoke aloud the first of the demon resurrection passages from the Book of the Dead.

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: And now, I fear that my wife has become host to a Kandarian demon.  May God forgive me for what I have unleashed onto this earth.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Ash, what's that you're playing?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Our song.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Ow!

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I really love it.  I'll never take it off.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: Kan Da, Es-trata ta-toon hazan sobar ...Ear-Grets, Gat...

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: ...Nos-Feratos...Amantos...Kanda!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Sun's driven it away... for now.  Gotta get the hell out of here... before night falls.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Annie!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Hi.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: How'd everything go on the expedition?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Terrific.  I found the additional pages from the Book of the Dead.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: So you said in the telegram.  What condition are they in?

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Haven't aged a day in three thousand years.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Maybe longer.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: When do we begin the translations?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Tonight.  Is everything all set with my father?

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Should be, but I haven't spoken to him in a week, what with no phone in that cabin.  Take us about an hour to get there.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: We'll take my car.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Annie, you hinted in your telegram that your father was on to something with the first part of his translations.  What's the big mystery?  What has he found in The Book of the Dead?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Maybe nothing.  But just possibly... the doorway to another world?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: DANCE WITH ME!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: That's all.  Just a crummy dr-

Speaker: linda's head
Dialogue: Hello lover, I came from the other side of your dream to dance with you.

Speaker: linda's head
Dialogue: Even now we have your darling Linda's soul!  She suffers in torment!

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Please Ash, help me.  I love you, please don't hurt me.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: You promised me we'd always be together.  You swore to me!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: NO!

Speaker: linda's head
Dialogue: YES!  YOU LIED TO HER! YOU LIED TO LINDA! YOUR LOVE WAS A LIE!  AND NOW SHE BURNS IN HELL!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Eat chainsaw.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: I'm fine... I'm fine...

Speaker: reflection
Dialogue: I don't think we're "fine".  We're losing it...  starting to slip.  We just cut up our girlfriend with a chainsaw.  Does that sound fine?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: You bastards.  Give me back my hand.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Can't... can't be happening.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Who's laughing now?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Who's laughing now!?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Excuse me.  This the road to the Knowby's cabin?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Thas' right.  But you ain't goin' there.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: And why not?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Lady, I ain't never seen nothin' like it.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Terrific.  Now what?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: There must be another way in. Another road or something.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Sure ain't no, road.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Hell you wanna go there for, anyway?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: None of your business.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Hey!  I just remembered... Yeah, that's right... There is a trail. You could follow Bobby Joe and me.

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: That sounds all right.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: But, it'll cost ya.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: How much?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Forty Fi...

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Hundred bucks.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Tell you what.  You take my bags you got a deal.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Sure!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Jesus H. Christ!  I thought she was talkin' 'bout them two goddamn little pieces!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Ha!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: You gonna be alright, honey?

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: You just sit still fer a minute.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: You know this son of a bitch?

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: No.  We thought her -

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Oh my God.  Where are my parents?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: What the hell did you do to them?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: We'll throw him in there.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Crazy buck's gone blood simple.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Wait... I made... a mistake...

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Damn right, you flat mouthed son of a bitch.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: I hope you rot down there!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: N... No.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: These are my father's things.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: Last night Henrietta tried to kill me.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: I cannot bring myself to dismember my wife, yet I know that I must, to halt the evil that lives within her.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: It is October 1, 4:33 p.m.  Henrietta is dead.  I could not bring myself to dismember her corpse.  But I buried her.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: I . . . buried her . . . in the cellar.

Speaker: professor knowby
Dialogue: God help me, I buried her in the earthen floor of the fruit cellar!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Someone's in my fruit cellar! Someone with a fresh soul!

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Somebody's down there with him.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No.  Can't be.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Let me out!  Let me out!!!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Let him out.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: It's a trick.  I know it.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: LET HIM OUT!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Come to me.  Come to sweet Henrietta.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Yesssssss.  You and I.  We shall spend eternity together.

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: But first I'll swallow your soul !

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: For God's sake!  That's my mother!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: There's something out there.  That... witch in the cellar is only part of it. It lives out in those woods.  In the Dark. Something that's come back from the dead.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Jake, let's beat it the hell out o'here, right now.  I gotta get out!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Now Bobby, you ain't in no condition.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Nobody goes out that door.  Not till daylight.

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Remember that song Annie?  I used to sing it to you when you were a baby.

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Let me out, dear.  It's so cold and dark in here.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Mother?

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Unlock these chains.  Quickly.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No.  No.  I don't know what you are but you're not my mother.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: That thing in the cellar is not my mother!

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: We want what is yours!  LIFE!

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: Dead by dawn!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Dead by dawn!  Dead by dawn!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Free me!  Unlock these chains!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Where are you going?!  HELP US!!  You filthy COWARD!

Speaker: ed
Dialogue: We see you!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Start up that saw and hand it here! We're gonna cut him up.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: START IT UP!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: NO!

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Jake, I can't take no more of this.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: That's funny.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: That trail we came in here on... well, it just ain't there no more. Like the woods jus' swallowed it.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: It's so quiet.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: What the hell is it?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Maybe something... Something trying to force its way into our world.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: It's in there.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: We'll all go in together.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Hell no, you're the curious one.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: I'll go with you.

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: Annie.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Holy Mother O'Mercy.

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: There is a dark spirit here that wants to destroy you.  Your salvation lies in the pages from the Book of the Dead.

Speaker: raymond
Dialogue: Recite the passages.  Dispel the evil. Save my soul... And your own lives.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Jake, you squeezing my hand too tight.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: I ain't got your hand, baby.

Speaker: bobby joe
Dialogue: Then who...?

Speaker: jake's voice
Dialogue: Somebody get the light!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Hey.  Bobby Joe's gone!

Speaker: tree face
Dialogue: BAHHHH!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Where the hell is she?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: We gotta go out there and find her!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: If she went out in those woods, she's not coming back.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Felt like someone just walked over my grave.  It's that picture.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: In 1300 AD.  This was the "Hero from the Sky," who was prophesized to destroy this Evil.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: He didn't do a very good job. What about the passages?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Here it is.  Two passages.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: We've got it!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Recitation of the first passage will make this "Dark Spirit" manifest itself in the flesh.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Why the hell would we want to do that?

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Recitation of the second passage creates a kind of rift in time and space, and the physical manifestation of this spirit can be forced back through this rift... to an earlier time and place.  At least that's the best translation I can ....

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: I'm runnin' the show now.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: We're goin' outside into those woods to look for Bobby Joe, an' once we find her, we're gettin' the hell outta here.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: If you want to look for her, go ahead.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: You two comin' with me.  I ain't goin' out there alone.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: NO, YOU IDIOT.  You'll kill us all. She's dead by now.  With these pages we can...

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Those pages don't mean shit.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: 'Sides.  Now you ain't got no, choice.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Now move!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Move you son of a bitch!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: No trail.  Which way do you intend to go?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Bobby Joe!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Bobby Joe!  Bobby Joe!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: You'll get us all killed.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Shaddup!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Bobby Joe!

Speaker: possessed ash
Dialogue: JOIN US!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Get the axe.  Kill it.  Kill it.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: No.  WAIT!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Listen to me!  I'm all right now.  That thing is gone.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: GOD DAMN IT!  I said I was all right!!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Are you sure?

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: You'll be the first to know. I'm fine.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Yeah, but for how long? If we're going to beat this thing, we need those pages.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Then let's head down into that cellar...

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: ...And carve ourselves a witch.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Groovy.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Those pages are down there somewhere.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: She's playing hard to get...

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: ... rid of.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: She got hungry.

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Come to me.  Come to sweet Henrietta!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Nos-feratos-allo-memnon-kanda!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Free!  Free at last!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: I'll swallow your soul, swallow your soul!

Speaker: henrietta
Dialogue: Swallow your soul!

Speaker: henrietta's head
Dialogue: Swallow your soul!  Swallow your soul!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Swallow this.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: May she rest in pieces.

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: No!  I only completed the first of the passages.  And that was to make the evil a thing of the flesh!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: You didn't finish it?!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: There's still the second passage. The one to open the rift and send the evil back.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Start reciting it.  Now!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Tar-tra Kanda-Estra!  Hudsucker Proxy -- Kanda!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Aton-Neran-Ofas!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: Finish it!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Kanda!  Samonda Roba Areda Gyes Indy En-zeen, Nos-Feratos -

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: Nos-feratos - Amen-non.  Ak-adeem! Razin - Arozonia!

Speaker: annie
Dialogue: ....Kanda!

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: You did it.  By God you did it.

Speaker: ash
Dialogue: For God's sake, how do you stop it?
